name: One Fish
description:
Intro:

Years of over fishing has really damaged the lake but your friends and family are hungry. Using your boat, travel around the small lake to find the last fish in the lake. Take your time, there is no limit.

The fish will spawn in a random location each time.

Controls:

  • W - Move forward
  • S - Move backward
  • A - Left rotate
  • D - Right rotate
  • E (hold) - Search for fish (red means not there, green means you found it!)

    Once the fish is found continue holding E and click the catch button.

Thank you for playing!

- Cody

Created for the GMTK 2019 Jam.

Music is used under free-use licenses.
